Title: Cards.NET
Description:
A class library with 3 classes representing a Deck, a Hand and a Card.

The deck can be with or without jokers, with or without cards lower than 7.

Included are 2 projects with visual presentations of (draggable) cards and hands using a Custom Control. A Windows Forms version an
